Tender Title: Great Arthur House Flat & Golden Lane Estate Office
Tender Description: Work to convert part of the ground floor of Great Arthur House to residential accommodation by building 1 x 2 bedroom fully adaptable unit and 1 x accessible unit, and the construction of a new reduced size estate office also on the ground floor of Great Arthur House

The City of London is seeking an Early Years specialist to support the service in further developing and leading the City of London Early Language and Communication programme and support settings and schools with their recovery plans following the Covid 19 outbreak. The role will also require continuing to build on the work already in progress with early years settings and primary schools. 
This is for 2 days a week in the academic years 2020-2021 and 2021-2022 to be used flexibly as required by the tasks.  The annual budget available is Â£42,000.
